mainSection.triraryHeading: Low impact, high intensity workout that strengthen & tone your body.

articles.heading: Join a full-body workout
articles.paragraph: Our studio bringing you remarkable full-body workouts focused on body positivity and inclusivity, with expert instructors to guide you every step of the way.

articles.heading: Workout at home
articles.paragraph: Hundreds of on-demand workouts. Start with a collection of fiery beginner barre workouts to light up your body in a powerful, methodical way.

aside.heading: Our Barre Classes
aside.paragraph: Prima Barre offers four group classes with unique full-body workouts focused on low-impact, high-intensity movements that lift and tone muscles and improve strength, agility, and flexibility for everybody.

cards.heading: Prima Barre Align
cards.paragraph: combines our classic strength-building barre technique with a unique emphasis on flexibility and balance training to deliver a restorative full body workout.

cards.heading: Prima Barre Define
cards.paragraph: fuses concepts from our classic barre technique with weight-based strength training to develop muscular strength and power.

cards.heading: Prima Barre Power
cards.paragraph: is our fusion workout of Classic Prime Barre and high-intensity interval training designed to elevate your heart rate, build strength, and increase your metabolism.

cards.heading: Prima Barre Classic
cards.paragraph: is our original barre class. Our proprietary technique is the fastest, most effective full-body workout.

formSection.heading: STAY CLOSER TO THE ACTION
formSection.paragraph: Enter your name and email address to receive email communications from Prima Barre including special offers, on-sale dates, and other updates.

footer.heading: FOLLOW US
footer.paragraph: Download the PRIMA BARRE app, access classes from anywhere, anytime

mainSection.primaryHeading: Who We Are and What We Do
mainSection.primaryParagraph: For over a decade, we have been empowering women through barre fitness. We provide a supportive and motivating community where women of all ages and fitness levels can come together. Our expert instructors guide clients through a series of movements focusing on isometric holds that engage and challenge the muscles.
mainSection.secondaryParagraph: At our barre studio, we are dedicated to providing high quality barre workout classes that improve strength, flexibility, and posture. Our classes focus on low impact, full body workouts that tone and sculpt muscles using the ballet barre.
mainSection.tertiaryParagraph: We take pride in our commitment to safety and proper form. Our instructors are trained to modify movements for all fitness levels and abilities. Our goal is to provide a challenging yet safe workout environment that leaves clients feeling motivated and energized.

cards.heading: ADRIENNE RABENA
cards.paragraph: Adrienne's classes are an enrapturing combination of rhythm, fluidity, and fire. She is fiercely dedicated to intuitive and flowing movement, and she delights in the challenge to choreograph transitions that feel seamless and beautiful.

cards.heading: EMILY SFERRA
cards.paragraph: After dancing professionally for several years post college, Emily transitioned into teaching barre and quickly fell in love with the intense physical and mental challenge this type of workout provides.

formSection.heading: Sign up for Prima Barre
formSection.instructions: Create an account or log in
formSection.communication: I want to receive email communications from Prima Barre including special offers, on-sale dates, and other updates.
